# Errbot


Errbot is a chatbot. It allows you to start scripts interactively from your chatrooms
for any reason: random humour, chatops, starting a build, monitoring commits, triggering
alerts...

It is written and easily extensible in Python.

Errbot is available as open-source software and released under the GPL v3 license.


## Features

### Chat servers support


**Built-in**

- IRC support
- Hipchat support
- Slack support
- Telegram support
- XMPP support

**With add-ons**

- CampFire (See instructions https://github.com/errbotio/err-backend-campfire)
- Cisco Spark (See instructions https://github.com/marksull/err-backend-cisco-spark)
- Discord (See instructions <https://github.com/gbin/err-backend-discord)
- Gitter support (See instructions https://github.com/errbotio/err-backend-gitter)
- Matrix (See instructions https://github.com/SShrike/err-backend-matrix)
- Mattermost (See instructions https://github.com/Vaelor/errbot-mattermost-backend)
- RocketChat (See instructions https://github.com/cardoso/errbot-rocketchat)
- Skype (See instructions https://github.com/errbotio/errbot-backend-skype)
- TOX (See instructions https://github.com/errbotio/err-backend-tox)
- VK (See instructions https://github.com/Ax3Effect/errbot-vk)
- Zulip (See instructions https://github.com/zulip/errbot-backend-zulip)

### Community and support

If you have:
* a quick question feel free to join us on chat at [errbotio/errbot on Gitter](https://gitter.im/errbotio/errbot).
* a plugin development question please use [Stackoverflow](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/errbot) with the tags errbot and python.
* a bug to report or a feature request, please use our [GitHub project page](https://github.com/errbotio/errbot/issues).


### Website: [https://errbot.io](https://errbot.io)
